#summary Wiki page naming rules

Wiki page naming
===Test case pages: tc_CAT_Subcat__TestName===

where 
  * tc means "test case"
  * CAT is test category short name:
   * HW - hardware
   * SF - software
   * MM - multimedia
   * WEB - internet
  * Subcat is test subcategory name

example: tc_HW_Sound_TestSound
